updates.title: Norse Mythology
updates.description: Back to sans-serif font and a colorless scheme to allow pages to accent as needed. Header is theoretically changable per page.

updates.title: Dat Rainbow
updates.description: Got tired of my site looking like facebook. Accidentally made it look a little googley now...

updates.title: Accidentally Looks Like Facebook
updates.description: Using the components from the last update, but heavily simplified. Blue bar looks like facebook.

updates.title: No Color
updates.description: A site with little color. User could scribble on the page with color.js
